item.title: PietyPk/Project-Role [PI] No Antileech - Fully Working - Customs
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

yamitheninja:

awesome server, whosever it is, but the donator :mad: area wont work, I made myself one and it still saying I have to be one to go, any ideas why??

The donator area works fine. go into your character folder, find your account, edit the isdonator= 1

then save the profile and you should be able to teleport by the equipment area donator icon.

Read full topic

item.title: PietyPk/Project-Role [PI] No Antileech - Fully Working - Customs
item.dc:creator: @RUNE-PK RUNE-PK
item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:

worthles:

Loaded Project-Rolex successfully!

Thats not the ip, Thats the server name…
You can change that by going
"Search for Server.Java in server files, Edit it once notepad opens hit Ctrl+f and search" “Project-Rolex” Change the text to what you want"

Edit: Don’t forget to compile after doing that

Read full topic

item.title: PietyPk/Project-Role [PI] No Antileech - Fully Working - Customs
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

“Support me via paypal for PietyPk/Project-Rolex v2 Would be amazing!”

No. This isn’t allowed. You should seriously read the rule (Lol I just posted about this not even an hour ago):

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:541506”][quote author=ohokay link=topic=660376.msg4415629#msg4415629 date=1395781623]

pretty sure he can offer a reward if he wants to? nobody has to help him lol

True, I always thought it was against the rules
[/quote]
That would be because it is…
We do not allow any form of payment for services/etc on these forums (you can arrange that outside of these forums and through PM. There is no section to “report a scammer”, so everything would be at your own risk. Moparscape nor the users are anyway responsible for you being scammed, and no one here will do a damn thing about it).

If anyone needs a refresher:

[quote]Rule 8:
We do not sell anything on this site, period. This includes offering ‘rewards’ for donations or anything like that. Selling via signature is not an exception. Furthermore, all requests of price or value for any property related to the game RuneScape is disallowed on these boards. This rule exists to prevent scamming, dishonest trading, and legal liability regarding the exchange of Jagex property. We do not encourage people to buy or sell anything related to RuneScape, Jagex, or any of their games.[/quote][/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: PietyPk/Project-Role [PI] No Antileech - Fully Working - Customs
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

austin cadle:

The Charmelion what caught my eye. :3 I’m still not much for customs, in fact I don’t plan to use customs in any of my releases, despite having used them in the past, they don’t give the same nostalgia feel that I play/code RSPS for. However, when handled correctly like your custom npc’s it seems pretty cool IMO. :3 10/10

Thanks bud i would love to work with you sometime skype:haviland41

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[quote=“1heart2body, post:23, topic:541302”][quote author=haviland4 link=topic=660175.msg4414780#msg4414780 date=1395353700]

I’m the main of Karmascape now host ash quit but I will just ask ash to take the links down go ahead release it but ur wasting ur own time :palm:

i dont seem to be wasting my own time? took me about 5minutes to release this a couple of days ago and now public players
have the files and a couple might even release them online so this will only mean karamscape has nothing anymore

no idea who ash is but i do believe this is moparscape and i have only released a server that i worked on.
Karamscape or what ever scape is only a leech from the main source files anyway so… :palm:
[/quote]
josh… dont take this files off if mopar did i will upload Main karmascape v3… “unreleased”, if the did anything idc i will release it in rswebclients and rspscoding and rune-server… Have Fun FAGGOT’S[/quote]
[b]
ok i wont remove them bud & to get to donatorzone make your character right to the donator rights then go onto the account and
click the iron helm and click the donator icon at the bottom you should have a couple of options click teleport to the donator zone.

hope i could help bud. [/b]
